arts.ttl: Milan’s third kit set to make competitive debut vs Bologna in Serie A
arts.sum: Debut night tonight at San Siro. Besides Adrien Rabiot, who will most likely start for the first time in his new chapter, Milan will officially wear their third kit for the first time this season. The kit is not new to fans, who already saw it during the Asia tour in the friendly against Liverpool. […]

arts.ttl: GdS: Milan gave ‘serious consideration’ to Bologna boss Italiano – the background
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan were linked with Vincenzo Italiano in the summer, before Massimiliano Allegri became head coach, and they will face him again tonight. As La Gazzetta dello Sport recall, on May 14th, Bologna beat Milan in the Coppa Italia final. Four months have passed, and exactly four months later – on September 14th – Milan […] The post GdS: Milan gave ‘serious consideration’ to Bologna boss Italiano – the background appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Calabria reveals Scudetto hope for Milan as well as thoughts on Allegri and Bologna
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Davide Calabria has revealed his hope that AC Milan win the Scudetto this season, while also admitting he remains very attached to the club. Milan made the decision to part ways with Calabria a few months ago, given that his contract was set to expire at the end of the season. The choice not to […] The post Calabria reveals Scudetto hope for Milan as well as thoughts on Allegri and Bologna appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Repubblica: Milan – Bologna: Pulisic part time?
arts.sum: Tonight Milan must win not only to try to keep up with Juventus and Napoli, who are already ahead, but also to avenge the defeat in the Coppa Italia final four months ago. For Max Allegri, the match against Bologna is not about revenge, since the ex Bianconeri coach cares little about the past; his […]

arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Milan’s Allegri bets on midfield power vs Bologna – Possible lineups
arts.sum: Max Allegri is betting everything on his super midfield. With Leao still out and expected to miss Saturday’s match in Udine before returning on the 28th at San Siro against Napoli, the ex Juventus coach will field four of his main men in the middle of the park. That includes new signing Adrien Rabiot, who […]

arts.ttl: GdS: Why Allegri will heavily rely on Milan’s midfield against Bologna
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri is hoping that the midfield will be AC Milan’s strength, heading into a crucial early-season game against Bologna. As La Gazzetta dello Sport (seen below) reports, Allegri is banking on his stellar midfield. arts.ttl: AC Milan vs Bologna – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AC Milan and Bologna go head-to-head in Serie A on Sunday at the San Siro. Both sides will be looking to build momentum after mixed starts to the 2025/26 season. Milan are seeking consistency under Massimiliano Allegri while Bologna aim to continue their positive trajectory under Vincenzo Italiano, following Coppa Italia success last season.
